vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.18;
son of: Peleg (H6389);
father of: Serug (H8286)
Also named: Rhagau<\i> (Ῥαγαῦ "Reu" G4466)
§ Reu = "friend"
son of Peleg and an ancestor of Abraham
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Péleg; descendiente de Sem
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拉吳 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "朋友"
法勒的兒子, 亞伯拉罕的祖先
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拉吴 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "朋友"
法勒的儿子, 亚伯拉罕的祖先
